Recycling: Green wheelie bin or green wheelie bin with blue lid | Collected weekly

Food and garden waste (outdoors): Brown wheelie bin | Collected every 2 weeks

Small electricals, batteries and clothes: Separate into plastic bags and place on top of your recycling bin

Recycling: Green communal bin with black lid | Collected weekly

Food waste recycling: Not always available* | Brown or grey outdoor bin | Collected weekly

Recycling: Green sacks | Collected Monday, Wednesday and Friday

Rubbish: Black sacks | Collected Monday, Wednesday and Friday
